properties.Key_Activi: 1. Soil conservation practices -  Developing the Nayawatta land (35°-60°)
properties.Proposed_m: 1. Live fencing/SALT  - 2500 m, 2. Lock and spills - 1000 m, 3. Stone terracing - 500 m, 4. Agronomic practices should be adapted at optimum level (conservation tillage, crop rotation and diversification, cover crops, mulching, contour farming, windbreak
properties.Contributi: Labour and other basic services by the Local community
